summary: Completed comprehensive security hardening verification for HR Performance Management staging deployment. All critical authorization boundaries, session security, and cycle integrity verified successfully.

minor_issues.issue: PDF size smaller than expected (2154 bytes vs 5000+ expected)
minor_issues.impact: PDF contains all required data but may have minimal content formatting

passed_tests: System Health Check - API responding correctly
AUTHORIZATION: Employee cannot access other employee's conversation - 403 Forbidden
AUTHORIZATION: Employee cannot access manager endpoints - 403 Forbidden
AUTHORIZATION: Manager cannot access non-report conversations - 403 Forbidden
AUTHORIZATION: Admin can access any conversation - 200 OK
SESSION: httpOnly cookies are set - HttpOnly flag verified
SESSION: Secure cookie attributes - SameSite and security flags present
SESSION: Invalid token rejection - 401 Unauthorized for invalid tokens
SESSION: Logout invalidates token - Tokens become invalid after logout
CYCLE: Only one active cycle enforced - Activating new cycle archives others
CYCLE: Status transitions work correctly - Draft->Active->Archived transitions
PDF: Export generates successfully - Returns proper PDF with correct content-type
PDF: Includes employee details in filename - Filename contains employee identifier
PDF: All conversation fields included - Self-review, goals, manager review, ratings, timestamps
PERSISTENCE: User data persists - Imported users remain in database
PERSISTENCE: Conversation data persists - Data retrieval matches creation
